com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.cluster

Class ServiceConfigurationReplicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.cluster.ServiceConfigurationReplicator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IServiceConfigurationReplicationPrimarySideOperationHandlers, IConfigurationEventListener

    public class ServiceConfigurationReplicator
extends Object
implements IServiceConfigurationReplicationPrimarySideOperationHandlers, IConfigurationEventListener
    Manages the service configuration replication at both the client and server side.

      • setRetrieveServiceConfigurationHashCode

        public void setRetrieveServiceConfigurationHashCode(IOperationInvoker retrieveServiceConfigurationHashCode)

      • getAggregatedHashCodeForAllServices

        public int getAggregatedHashCodeForAllServices()
        This operation is called on the primary side. It retrieves the configuration hashcode for all services that have configuration. The operation will also check if the configuration for a particular service has changed, if it has its in memory representation and hashcode is refreshed.
        Returns:
        The group message to be sent to all secondaries. A hex string with a hashcode for each service.

      • hashCodeMatchesPrimaryAndNoHashCodeRefreshRequired

        public boolean hashCodeMatchesPrimaryAndNoHashCodeRefreshRequired(SocketEndpoint source,
                                                                  int hashCode)
        The internal hashCode representing local service configuration is compared with the hashCode of the primary node configuration. If they match true is returned otherwise false is returned
        Parameters:
        source - The socket endpoint of the primary node.
        hashCode - The service configuration hashCode of the primary node.
        Returns:
        whether hash codes match

      • handleServiceConfigurationFileInfoRequest

        public String handleServiceConfigurationFileInfoRequest(String message)
        Description copied from interface: IServiceConfigurationReplicationPrimarySideOperationHandlers
        Retrieve a list of filenames and filesizes.
        Specified by:
        handleServiceConfigurationFileInfoRequest in interface IServiceConfigurationReplicationPrimarySideOperationHandlers
        Parameters:
        message - A hexadecimal string representing binary data. This string includes the service name and hashcode. See ServiceConfigurationFileInfoRequest
        Returns:
        A hexadecimal string containing the filenames and filesizes. See ServiceConfigurationFileInfoResponse

      • handleServiceConfigurationFragmentRequest

        public String handleServiceConfigurationFragmentRequest(String message)
        Description copied from interface: IServiceConfigurationReplicationPrimarySideOperationHandlers
        Retrieve a fragment from a specified service and filename.
        Specified by:
        handleServiceConfigurationFragmentRequest in interface IServiceConfigurationReplicationPrimarySideOperationHandlers
        Parameters:
        message - A hexadecimal string representing binary data. The string includes the service name, filename, offset within the file and fragment length. See ServiceConfigurationFragmentRequest.
        Returns:
        The fragment requested as a hexadecimal binary string. See ServiceConfigurationFragmentResponse

      • handleServiceConfigurationHashCodeRequest

        public String handleServiceConfigurationHashCodeRequest(String message)
        Description copied from interface: IServiceConfigurationReplicationPrimarySideOperationHandlers
        Retrieve the hashcode for this service. See ServiceConfigurationHashCodeRequest
        Specified by:
        handleServiceConfigurationHashCodeRequest in interface IServiceConfigurationReplicationPrimarySideOperationHandlers
        Parameters:
        message - A hexadecimal string representing binary data. The string includes the service name.
        Returns:
        A hexadecimal string representing binary data. The string includes the service name and requested hashcode. See ServiceConfigurationHashCodeResponse
